Dear Tarek, 

Good day. 

 

Please be informed that the Chanel Jeddah boutique was renovated and we moved all the stocks from the Temporary location to the renovated store on 31/08/2024.  

We would like to request you to cancel the below Chanel Temp Insurance accordingly.

Al Nujaima

CHANEL BOUTIQUE, JEDDAH (Temp)

	          6,000,000
